text: Le Mesnil-Caussois is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune of Noues de Sienne.Arrêté préfectoral 6 December 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Le Mesnil-Caussois
